snippet: The string of shootings followed an annual cycle of violence recognized by the New York Police Department: When the temperature rises, the level of violence climbs along with it.
abstract: New York City Police Dept says at least 13 people are wounded in string of separate shootings across Brooklyn, the Bronx and Upper Manhattan; shootings follow what has been cycle of violence that rises along with the temperature.
lead_paragraph: The string of shootings followed an annual cycle of violence recognized by the New York Police Department: When the temperature rises, the level of violence climbs along with it.

headline.main: At Least 13 Are Wounded by Gunfire Across New York City
headline.print_headline: At Least 13 Are Wounded by Gunfire Across the City
